summary: This is an email chain from February 2021 regarding scheduling a call between legal teams. It mentions that 'Menninger' is calling friends and family to get information, and discusses coordinating a meeting in March. The correspondence involves lawyers from Panish Shea & Boyle LLP and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Menninger
persons.context: Mentioned as calling friends and family trying to get information, likely in the context of an investigation or case.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting
events.description: Legal teams are scheduling a meeting for the first week of March to discuss case matters.

locations: Panish Shea & Boyle LLP, 11111 Santa Monica Boulevard, Suite 700, Los Angeles, CA 90025
Southern District of New York, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Menninger is actively contacting friends and family to gather information, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
Legal teams from Panish Shea & Boyle LLP and the Southern District of New York are coordinating a meeting in March 2021.
The email chain is marked confidential, relating to privileged legal communication.
The correspondence shows continued legal proceedings or investigations related to the Epstein case in early 2021.
